title: Input schema for Instagram profile scraper
description: Set up this simple scraper to get posts from Instagram profiles. To try it out, just type in a username or paste a URL, click on ▷ Start and your data is on its way! If you need any guidance, just follow this video tutorial.

username.title: Instagram username
username.description: Just insert a username or URL of the profile you want to get the posts from.

resultsLimit.title: Maximum posts per profile
resultsLimit.description:
Maximum number of posts you want to scrape per profile. If you set it to 5, you'll get 5 posts for each profile you've included. 
 Instagram show only limited amount of posts (about 24) if you are not logged in. If you want more please log into an account on Instagram in the cookies section bellow.

loginCookies.title: Use cookies to log into an account for more results (read more â†’)
loginCookies.description:
Instagram limits access to certain data if a user is anonymous. You can get more Instagram posts if you provide cookies to log in as a regular Instagram user.
Note that we recommend that you do not use your own Instagram account for this - use a new, temporary Instagram account.
Check out this tutorial on installing a cookie editor.
